title: Bug 2120MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: The files that were opened in the previous session do not appear in the Most Recently Used (MRU) file list in the File menu. However, when opening files in the current session, they do appear in the MRU list.
EB: The MRU file list should persist between sessions, so that the files opened in the previous session are still displayed in the MRU list when starting a new session.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Start the workbench.
2. Open 2 or 3 files.
3. Shutdown the workbench.
4. Restart the workbench.
5. Check the File menu MRU list to see if the previously opened files are displayed.
